title: Bobby Gets Really Upset With Customer Service + Is Amy’s Husband Creepy For Watching Kids Football Practice? + Bobby Attempts To Break 90’s Country Lyric World Record
itunes:title: Bobby Gets Really Upset With Customer Service + Is Amy’s Husband Creepy For Watching Kids Football Practice? + Bobby Attempts To Break 90’s Country Lyric World Record
description:
Bobby rarely gets upset with customer service, but something happened at his hotel that he couldn’t believe. Amy’s husband wants to know if he’s creepy for stopping to watch some kids football practice even though he doesn’t have a kid playing. Bobby attempts to see how many song titles he can identify with Amy reading only the lyrics!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
